description: Lofted 2nd Floor Apartment with Spiral Staircase
name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Margaret4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 3 beds ·  · 1 bath
more description: My place is close to the Blue Line, the highway, Downtown, Logan Square, Wicker Park, Bucktown, Humbolt Park, and Lincoln Park. You'll love my place because of the central location, free parking, delicious local restaurants, and easy commute to anywhere in the city. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travel, and families with kids. This is a new listing for the same unit I've been hosting for 4 years. Please click on my name and read all my reviews for this space!The spaceHello travelers! Welcome to our home in the city. This is a 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom space with an attic loft. There is a queen bed in the bedroom, and two twin beds in the loft. This is a second floor unit located on Western Ave., so there is some noise from the street. It does quiet down at night and the bedroom is towards the rear of the apartment so if you're looking for a city apartment that's minutes from it all, this is the one!There is free street parking on Western Ave. The Blue Line Western stop is just a few blocks south. This is the train that runs from O'hare Airport all the way downtown. If you're driving, the Kennedy Expressway 94 is just 2 blocks north, off the Fullerton exit.There is a secure lock box with 2 keys for easy check-in. We have exterior security cameras for additional security. This also means we can see how many people come in and out of the apartment so please be honest when making your booking as any unapproved guests will be charged the additional guest fee. Any unapproved parties or gatherings will be charged the full security deposit. My husband and I designed and built this unit. We hope you enjoy this simple, cozy, no fuss place that's so close to it all!

description: Studio in the heart of Lincoln Park - Vibesbnb
name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Magda2 guests ·  · Studio ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
more description: Welcome to Chicago! Centrally located cozy studio in the heart of beautiful Lincoln Park. You will be in the best location to explore everything that Chicago has to offer. Near by many restaurants, bars,  lakefront,  the north avenue beach, Lincoln Park Zoo, Wrigley Field and Boystown. The bus and train are both within walking distance with a short ride to downtown Chicago .The spaceThis is a comfortable studio apartment  with queen size bed and everything you might need, great for 1- 2 people. You will find a functioning kitchen with coffee make and all the essentials to make a meal. Bathroom - we provide shampoo, conditioner and body wash in addition to hand soap, towels  and blow dryer. Closet to hang clothes and a dresser, couch, TV with streaming apps, work desk with a printer  also laundry in the basement.

description: McCormick Place Studio/parking/sleeps up to 4
name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Milan4 guests ·  · Studio ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
more description: • Steps away from McCormick Place• Michigan Avenue location• 2 shifts Security officers in the building• City view• Queen size bed + Queen size Air mattress for 2 extra guests• Comfortable stay for up to 4 guests at a time• Access to the Gym• Dedicated Internet• 4K smart HDTV(Netflix and Roku)• Fully equipped & stocked kitchen with complimentary Coffee & Tea• Walk to Restaurants and Shopping• Minutes to all touristic destinations• Optional Parking space for only $25/dayThe spaceDesigned with the traveler in mind, this Studio Suite (Sleeps 4) caters all your needs in a modern, spacious layout with metropolitan decor that gives this suite a sophisticated edge. The Michigan Suites are thriving with downtown vibes. The suite offers guests a modern space with custom comforts that are a cut above the usual Airbnb experience. It is uniquely designed to its own stylish accents and convenient amenities to give you the perfect mixture of home and away. At the premium status level, our suite provides you with a premiere experience in a premiere city.At a Glance:- Michigan avenue location- 1 Queen bed in the unit for the initial two guests + Queen size Air mattress with fresh bedding is provided for extra two guests in case if the reservation is for 4 people- Custom furnishing- Dedicated Internet- In walking distance to the best bars and restaurantsOur McCormick Lofts have  high ceilings and stunning views of the South loop to make your stay the perfect combination of comfort and lifestyle. Our guests enjoy apartment features including beautiful 10-12 ft lofted ceilings, remodeled floors and kitchens. The fitness room comes in especially handy in the winter, complete with cross training, treadmills, and weight sets.Our properties are the top-rated locations in Chicago! Guests are happier about it compared to other properties in the area. This can be easily checked in our over 1000 reviews.This property is also rated for the best value in Chicago! Guests are getting more for their money when compared to other properties in the city.Central Heating and CoolingContemporary KitchensLarge WindowsNew CountertopsLuxury Vinyl TileStainless Steel AppliancesBedroom ClosetsSteps away from McCormick Place and SquareAround 1 mile to South of Museum CampusEasy Access to Lakefront and Grant ParkEasy Access to Local ExpresswaysEasy Access to Public TransportationWalkscore: 92Q: Is the neighborhood safe?A: Very much so. 24 hours a day.Q: How far away are you from....A: McCormick? 7-9 min walkThe nearest Subway station? 5-6 min walkSoldier Field? 5 min uber Museum Campus? 7min uberDowntown? 8 min uberQ: PARKING?A: We have an optional parking spot for our renters for only $25/dayQ: Do I need to bring towels, a hair dryer, or linens?A: Nope! We provide all these things. We also provide you with a starter pack of toilet papers, individually wrapped toothbrushes, individual toothpastes. Q: When can I check in or check out? A: Check in is 4pm and check out is 11am. Early check-ins can be difficult if there are guests who checked out same day. We ask for an early check-in, or a late-check out fee, if you request either.Q: Can I come and go as I please?A: Yes. And we wouldn't trust any listing with which this isn't the case.Q: Is the place professionally cleaned between guests?A: Yes, and we take pride in providing a clean home for guests.Q: What's my total booking price? A: We honestly have no idea. With fees included, it only shows the guest how much they pay. This figure should be present after you enter your dates. Note that pricing varies on a daily basis, and it actually uses an algorithm to adjust it automatically.Q: Are the beds comfortable?A: Very. Some guests say they're the best they've ever slept on and asked us where we bought the mattresses from.

name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Patricia5 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
more description: Lavish Gold Coast spacious apartment in the best location in Chicago. This large unit offers sweeping views of the city. Relax indoors amongst designer furnishings, flat-screen TV, and luxe amenities. The building features a rooftop pool on the 24th floor, gym, and business center. This unit meets all modern needs: full kitchen, in-suite washer/dryer, and premium mattresses.The spaceThe bedroom includes a large King Bed that can sleep three if needed. We have an amazing Crate & Barrel sofa bed in the living room that folds out into a queen size bed that can be made with fresh clean linen and a comforter with extra pillows. We also supply a queen size air mattress. Gold Coast is home to some of the best restaurants in Chicago RIGHT ACROSS THE STREET FROM OUR BUILDING. Enjoy Tavern on Rush, Gibsons Steak, and many more steps away.

name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Garrie2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
more description: Our stylish one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment is a perfect place for exploring Chicago. Whatever brings you to the city, you'll feel right at home in our pleasant, quiet neighborhood. Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place.The spaceOur one-bedroom home has a king-size bed, premium linens, and enough closet space for you to unpack and store your luggage.There is also a full bathroom with a shower, sink, and toilet. Shampoo, conditioner, and body wash are all provided, as well as hand soap and fluffy towels. A hot shower is the best way to warm up after a stroll through Chicago.The kitchen is fully stocked with dishes, utensils, and cookware. A stove, oven, full-size fridge and freezer, dishwasher, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker are among the appliances.

description: Sonder Jewelers Row | Superior One-Bedroom Apartment
name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Sonder (Chicago)2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bath
more description:
Jewelers Row is the architectural gem of the Chicago Loop. Designed by Adler and Sullivan, the innovative style adds a modern touch to the building. Tall windows brighten up each space, complete with a fully equipped kitchen and in-suite laundry. Check out the dynamic food scene and vivid Theater District in this fascinating city. The Bean landmark and State Street shopping are just minutes away. Set between high-rises and Millenium Park, Jewelers Row offers a stylish space for your stay.The spaceWorking, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

- Contact-free check-in
 - 24/7 virtual support 
- Super-fast WiFi 
- Fresh towels and bathroom essentials
 - Pre-cleaning before your arrival
- Roku and HDMI cord for streaming 
- Fully equipped kitchen
- In-suite laundry

What’s nearby 
- 3 minute walk to The Gage (inventive American eats with Millennium Park views) 
- 3 minute walk to Pittsfield Cafe (classic diner favorites in a historic building) 
- 9 minute walk to Cindy’s Rooftop (stylish rooftop bar with delicious eats)
 - 5 minute walk to Millennium Park 

We have multiple spaces at this property, each designed to give you a beautiful place to stay — while our style is consistent, the view, layout, and design may vary.

name: Apartment in Chicago

number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 2 baths**__**Joined in December 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Enjoy staying in this gorgeously designed apartment! The place is spacious, bright and well-lit. Decorated with modern and chic furniture and a fully-furnished kitchen with high-quality appliances. The place is located in a culturally diverse south side community and in a  neighborhood that is surrounded by beautiful green spaces and lush foliage, lots of sports facilities and an outdoor skating rink!The spaceIn the heart of historic Hyde Park, our apartment features King-size beds, premium linens, and plenty of closet space so you can unpack and forget about your suitcase for a while. Enjoy the privacy of your own room, with doors that close and independently controlled air-conditioning units.The apartment includes 2 full bathrooms, with a shower, sink, and toilet. We’re all about helping you look (and smell) your best, so we provide shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in addition to hand soap and fluffy towels. Trust us when we say there’s no better way to warm up after a Windy City walk than a hot shower!There’s ample space for guests to relax on the sofa and watch on a large flat-screen TV. Like the rest of the unit, you’ll live it up in luxury among hardwood floors and contemporary décor. The entire place has free, fast Wi-Fi and Chicago sunshine streaming in through the windows.Whether you’re craving a home-cooked meal or just somewhere to put the box of deep-dish, our kitchen is fully stocked with cookware, dishes, utensils, and has swanky granite counter tops. Appliances include a full-sized fridge and freezer, gas stove, oven, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker. The only things missing are your favorite farmer’s market finds!**AC: We remove the window air conditioner before the winter comes. This prevents cold air from entering during cold weather and protects the window unit from damage caused by snow and ice.**

description: Real Comfort in a 2BR APT close to Wrigley Field
name: Apartment in Chicago
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Mia & Noah4 guests ·  · 2 bedrooms ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 2 bedrooms · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in September 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: A fully furnished home for your longer stay, complete with WiFi and everything you need to live.Heading to a baseball game or planning a fun-filled Windy City getaway? Our sophisticated 2-bedroom/1-bath apartment is just one block from Wrigley Field, home of the world-famous Chicago Cubs. The apartment features conveniences like a full kitchen and fast WiFi so you can live the Chi-Town life like a local.The spaceJust one short block from Wrigley Field, this charming 2-bedroom apartment is ideal of any visit to the Windy City, whether traveling on business or for a fun-filled vacation. The location is perfect for Cubs games (just a 3-minute walk!) and entertainment, with the Metro concert venue and the Music Box Theatre also a short walk away.But exploring Chicago is only part of the fun, because our sunny apartment is also sure to be a highlight of your time in town. You’ll feel just like a Chicago local with conveniences like a full kitchen, a spacious living room, and fast WiFi. A particularly stylish Chicago local - this apartment oozes modern glamour with professionally curated furnishings and decor.The apartment includes 2 private bedrooms, which features queen size beds, nightstands, a large window, and a closet with hangers. You’ll sleep like a baby Chicagoan on our plush mattresses and stay cozy during a Midwestern winter with high-quality sheets.The chic bathroom also has a touch of modern design, and the bathroom fixtures include a sink, toilet, and a shower. There’s ample space to put your lotions and potions in the bathroom cabinets, and we provide freshly-laundered towels, toiletries, and a hair dryer for your convenience.The airy living room and fully equipped kitchen allow you to feel right at home from the moment you walk in. Whether your idea of a relaxing night includes channeling your inner chef over a delicious home-cooked meal or binging on your latest Netflix show on the huge, 55-inch smart TV, you’ll have plenty of space to do whatever you please.The kitchen is stocked with all the dishes, utensils, and cookware you’d need - whether you’re honing your toast-making skills or whipping up a five-course dinner. Appliances include a stove, oven, full-size fridge and freezer, dishwasher, microwave, toaster, and coffee maker. Pull up a chair and dig into your culinary creations at the dining table which seats 6. And you’ll feel like you’re on an episode of Cribs among the gorgeous (and numerous!) cherry-wood cabinetry.So no matter how you choose to spend your time in the Windy City, whether by scarfing down hot dogs at a Cubs game or perusing the art galleries of Downtown Chicago, you’ll have a comfortable, stylish place to begin and end each day.
